title: Why Matteo Jorgenson Gambled Tour de France Selection with Move to Jumbo-Visma
content:
'I wanted to find a place where I could become the best version of myself': US star trades leadership at Movistar for longer-term payoffs.

Read the full article at Why Matteo Jorgenson Gambled Tour de France Selection with Move to Jumbo-Visma on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
